title: Insomniac

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give at least one cup of coffee to all factions in the game before the game ends. Neutrals are included.

desc:
Post 325
Abilities
- During the day, give someone a drink of coffee, allowing them to stay awake. They may use their ability twice tonight and can speak during the night alongside you. Not usable on D1.

Attributes
- You are muted during the day, but can talk during night.
- Cannot self-target.
